channel.title: The Shield of the Undead
channel.description: Here is my 2nd ever model it is a shield of scythes, I'm still not that great at modeling so please CRITICIZE! Also, If you can help me out, When you look to the opposite side of the shield it's invis, help if you can. If people want, I will release so just ask.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2009, 07:56:44 am[/size][hr]Also, mod if you need to lock because of me asking for a little help in there, do so or if you could just edit it out, thanks.

item.title: The Shield of the Undead
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Alright, seriously, stop with all this “omfg it looks like a swastika” shit. you guys gotta get over the past. we know it happened. we know it was horrible. we dont need to keep bringing it up. any Jewish people on here surely dont want to read all your swastika talk. take it up with the owner in PM.

Read full topic

item.title: The Shield of the Undead

Maybe this video of mine can help you understanding how depth is made when tracing.


[/quote]
When there is like 1 minut left, your movie freezes and pauses… so I couldn’t finish.[/quote]
The last minute is the most epic part of the video, turn your volume up to 100%
